ygData.subject: Plane of Hate and bard armor Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Which mob drops the bard armor? I heard tell that bard armor has been moved from PoF  (boogeymen) to PoH. Mummy monks - warrior armor, clerics of innorukk -
ygData.messageBody:
Which mob drops the bard armor? I heard tell that bard armor has been
moved from PoF (boogeymen) to PoH.
Mummy monks - warrior armor, clerics of innorukk - cleric armor, male
revenants - mage armor, female revenants - enchanter armor, gargoyles -
rogue armor, spite golems - shaman armor.
Now this leaves a few mobs.. the ire (somethings or other. they look
like ghouls), the ashenbone drakes (mini dracoliches), the scorn
banshees, the liches (mini spectres), and possibly some other mobs left
that i didnt see.

If anyone knows, please do tell.

Maev Lorekeeper
Tarew Marr
